message:
I'm going to be sitting on an airplane and don't want to pull my computer out. What is the best report to print out so I can "fill in the blanks" as I work? 

I'm imagining something that looks like the Story Points screen in the program, but the report itself doesn't have those nice big, blank grids.
Can you export your report to Word and add your own spaces before you print?
I found that Story Points has too much text for this technique. Story Engine Settings is a better way to go. (I'm also using Kitchen Sink.)
Never tried Kitchen Sink. Didn't realize what I was missing.
Me neither. I feel like it's a good reminder of all the balances a story has to contend with.
